website_summaries.verdict: The best budget set of bongos that is the perfect choice for beginners and intermediate players.
pros: High-quality shell construction using light wood
The natural finish resists fingerprints and scratches when playing the bongos
cons: Chrome hardware can tarnish after basic use

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bongos for Christmas to give to my 7 year old daughter. It's the only thing she asked for all year. They came in a box and in the box they were in a zipped up travel/storage bag. The skins were a little loose but I think its so they don't get ruined during shipping. It comes with the tools to tighten up the skins. They sound great and the wood is shiny and look beautiful. These are a really quality and perfect for a beginner. I would recommend buying them if you are interested. If you found this review helped you decide, please hit the "helpful" button 🖤 thanks
customer_reviews.author: A. Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed; one of the drums came completely torn. This was a surprise present for my son, who thinks his talent is drumming with a pencil on a table top. I will be returning this right away.
customer_reviews.author: star

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for a one year old. We are ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a one year old. We are a musically inclined family, and we're more concerned with sound quality than colorful drums. One year old loves it because he can feel the vibrations and sounds.
customer_reviews.author: GypsieNightingale

customer_reviews.title: price.
customer_reviews.text: I think this was damaged and sent back out. There was 3 crack on the larger one and the skin was damaged I sent that one back and order a new one keeping my fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: RockJam 7" and 8" Bongo Drum
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to purcase these before Christmas but they were sold out. So I opted for these. Pretty disappointed. Good looking and they came with a nice bag. However, quality issues forced me to return the set. The top and bottom bands on the large drum showed noticeable gaps between the rings and the skin. Also, the tension rod brackets on the bottom ring were not welded pallel to the ring.. Even after retuning several times, the gap was still there. I never could get a good sound out of them. The item was returned.
customer_reviews.author: quadsforever

customer_reviews.title: DON'T TIGHTEN IT, IT WILL BREAK. CHEAP, LOW QUALITY.
customer_reviews.text: Not very good, quality or value. It's more of a toy than a real instrument. Our first one came with one side soldered jook broken. DO NOT ATTEMPT TO TIGHTEN IT, IT WILL BREAK. PRIME QUICKLY RESOLVED. Another was shipped, came fast, but considering the first one came broken, I decided not to even touch it either. Better to spend the money on one with a better jook design. It's the same under other name brands. Look carefully at the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: LJC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and wonderful sound!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bongos for my kid to give him something to tap. He says he wants drumming lessons so I thought this would be good until we can set that up. The quality of these bongos is impressive. They are adjustable for tuning. The carry case they came in is beautiful as well. I think these will last forever. Definitely not a cheap toy but a quality crafted instrument at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Lynn Kaharick

customer_reviews.title: Fun set. Doesn't feel like a toy.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent musical instrument. Comes with a basic canvass storage bag and tuner wrench. Not a big fan of the logo on the drum heads, but it's quality construction and materials make these easily forgivable. Maybe they will rub off with time. I expect them to hold up for some time. Made an excellent gift for my 9 year old son, and I will also get some use out of them too.
customer_reviews.author: A.Ray

customer_reviews.title: Defective, unsafe, loose metal strip on Cute drums
customer_reviews.text: I received a defective set. The metal on the bottom rim is not attached well at all. The drum top is discolored. Otherwise, I would probably like these cute lil drums if the looked just like the ad pic with no defects.
customer_reviews.author: SaiSexy

customer_reviews.title: Designed well, elegant & fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both the striped and natural bongos from rock jam and I'm pleased with both. The family plays with them for sing along around the campfire, to let out anxiety and pacify themselves. There was a bit of looseness at one of the joints which was eliminated with heavy duty glue thus the 4 stars. They're great beginner bongos and I recommend both but I prefer the striped bongos as they're cosmetically pleasing to the eye.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Rockjam 7"/8" bongo.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, well made and finished, nice clear coat on it, great drum set for this price point. Even the inside..picked off one piece of wood, and yes, there is some glue runs...nothing terrible, and lets me know...enough glue was used! Pleasantly surprised. Awesome gifting for kids/grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph F. Bierley

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: They look like they are made well, but the sound leaves much to be desired. They sound like you're beating on card board boxes. The sound is soft and hollow. Okay for a child's toy i suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Okay for a toy. Horrible for first time players.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality. I purchased this, it came broken. Specifically the drum head ring has vertical tightening bars that extend down the side of the drum. These snapped off the ring. I returned the product. Got a new one. No issues. Next day, the drum went out of tune. No problem it comes with a tuning wrench. One turn and the welds on the ring snapped just like the previous broken one. This is a poor product for someone who wants to have a set of working bongos for music.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great drum for our kids
customer_reviews.text: Since my husband loves to play the guitar and our kids like to jam with him I thought a drum would be a great addition to their fun. It’s a sturdy set that has good sound and is a very nice size for the whole family. The carrying case is a great addition since it fits the drum perfectly. We are all supremely happy with the purchase and would definitely suggest others to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Oberti

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made and breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for our family music lessons and the first set AND the replacement both broke in the same way right after unpacking it and trying it out. One of the metal v-shaped prongs which hold the screw for tuning popped right off of the metal frame. The welding is very poor. See photos for reference. Overall, I can tell that these simply are not well-made drums. I returned both and opted for a refund the second time it happened.
customer_reviews.author: The EC

customer_reviews.title: NOT RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves drums so I ordered this drum. When I opened the bag, IT SMELLS SO BAD, like someone's feet. And the inside of the drums are all moldy. So I returned for an replacement. Second drum came even worse, the holders are rusty and still smell very bad. I put them on the patio to air out for two days, still stinks. So returning right now. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lee

customer_reviews.title: Wtf
customer_reviews.text: I mean at least they’re bongos but they sound bad, we’re falling apart. They look used. My package came with really rusty wrenches? And when I opened the case it made we want to vomit it smelled so bad. Pretty confused honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria wing

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the sound of these
customer_reviews.text: These did not make a very good sound at all. It was like banging on a cardboard box, even with tuning. Also the carry bag came with a side seam that was not sewn into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Akopov

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Way out of tune. Once tuned 6 inch head broke two week later. Cost of new head was same as entire set. Upgraded to a cheap Tycoon set and couldn't be happier! Way better sound
customer_reviews.author: Steve F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound , great for beginners , but for pros the edge and tighting screws might be a problem . My fingers hit these while playing and after a long session you feel it even with drum tape. However a great value for the weekend warrior .
customer_reviews.author: m tyler

customer_reviews.title: Embarrassed by broken drums (Christmas gift)
customer_reviews.text: These drums disappointed me. I BOUGHT THIS for my son for Christmas and he opened the drums with a broken tuner. That made me feel sick that my son couldn't enjoy his gift, I mean really, on Christmas, I was embarrassed and upset.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Got the drum set as a learning drum set for me and it os great!! You have to tune it before you ...
customer_reviews.text: Product came on time and very well packed. Got the drum set as a learning drum set for me and it os great!! You have to tune it before you ise it but vert easy to tune (youtube it) lol! I am so happy with this set besides being so fancy and stylish they have a great sound.
customer_reviews.author: karen diaz

customer_reviews.title: Buy it used good. Not new and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Its an instrument for kids or beginners its understanding. Cheap material its understanding. But at least it should be able to take at least a little torque for some tunning. I fixed the first one that broke and an other one broke immediately. One i can fix two or maybe the rest of them its to much work. Its going to the trash. I learned my lesson on musical instruments
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, came a little dirty
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this for my 9 year old daughter for Christmas. Comes with a nice carrying case. The top part of the bongos came in looking dirty- it a white material that has black markings on it, but other than that they seem pretty high quality.
customer_reviews.author: peachblack22

customer_reviews.title: nice entry level set, good customer service
customer_reviews.text: got this set for my husband as a gift. we initially had an issue with one of the heads tearing -- instead of returning, we reached out to the company's customer service department and they were more than accommodating. since then he's been happily banging away at them. highly recommended !
customer_reviews.author: D. David

customer_reviews.title: Bongo for our baby
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 9 month old son , he loves to play it (supervised of course ) he’s played with both hands so why not buy him a good one . It’s so well made , we use the carry case all the time .. easy to adjust with the tool that cane with it ..
customer_reviews.author: alisonpamela

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: My bongo sure makes boppin’ beats, but the inside is cracked where the drums are attached to each other. I’m using these for personal entertainment rather than professional music making, so they’re fine. However, I think if you’re planning on learning how to play, in a serious way, then maybe this bongo isn’t for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a kid beginner! My son loves it and finds YouTube video to learn. The case is thin so I don’t think that will last long. But we’ll worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Lupita Morales

customer_reviews.title: El diablo se lo comioooooooo!
customer_reviews.text: broke within minutes. Attempted to tune and tighten just a little bit and the head broke. No bueno for me. This product is for little kids who are just learning, but would not recommend for actual play.
customer_reviews.author: agizzle

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply polished wood. Splinters underneath and inside. As I was gently tightening a bolt, the metal bracket broke off The upper rim. Spend extra $50 get the LP aspire even if you are a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo fakhoury

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I got a previously returned item... but this was clearly destroyed. Came with no carrying case like advertised, rust on the metal, and the skin wasn’t even on the one side... sharp thin metal on the bottom. Poor quality for an adult, and dangerous for children.
customer_reviews.author: Josh R

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep my boys busy.
customer_reviews.text: Keeping the kids busy and doesnt drive me crazy with the noise because its semi muffled compared to other drums in enclosed spaces
customer_reviews.author: For Reals Mom

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: Bongos are nice, but no tuning key came with it as promised and that was an important part. I give it 3 stars also because there is no way to get a hold of someone so they can send a tuning key. They have no direct route through here for emailing.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Mayle

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The drums were not the best workmanship and the sound was not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: John Nettnin

customer_reviews.title: Great value- so well made.
customer_reviews.text: perfect! great sound and value,. I am addicted to the bongos, Identical bongo sells for 3 times as much ob EB. Comes with padded case and tuning key: very professional!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Miller

customer_reviews.title: Get something better
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a musician and even if they came bad he said they sounded like play toys i would recommened buying better ones
customer_reviews.author: Mirelys Aponte

customer_reviews.title: this was a gift for my son. He likes ...
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for my son. He likes the bongos a lot. He's just learning how to play them. the case is handy to store them or carry them around.
customer_reviews.author: S.K.T.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these drums
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very poor. When I went to return the item it offered a replacement and it only gave me a choice of five other things that were generously lower than the amount I spent on the drums. Things I didn't want when I tried to contact customer service it wouldn't let me enter my phone number there's no other way to contact customer service I'm very very unsatisfied with the product and the service
customer_reviews.author: Shanna mccain

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good entry-level unit
customer_reviews.text: For such a low price these are nice as an entry-level bongo set for children. Sound and quality are okay and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gaudreau

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the new one
customer_reviews.text: It’s broken the first time my husband used it!!! I have to returning. I hope the new one works better!!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Irene Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just great! Did need a lot of tuning at first.
customer_reviews.author: Speaker Nut

customer_reviews.title: The carrying case is also nice for storage
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Christmas present for my 9 year old who wants to be a drummer. He loves them. Well made product. The carrying case is also nice for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Harris

customer_reviews.title: meh...
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted some cheap bongos for outdoors. I got what I ordered. The sound from the thin skins echos as a reminder of the quality.
customer_reviews.author: R T

customer_reviews.title: Better for children.
customer_reviews.text: Feels more like a toy, and they sent the wrong color. Price is fair
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Peres

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Bongoes
customer_reviews.text: These are garbage bongoes, barely held together, heads cut badly.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment!
customer_reviews.text: My wife now beats on these instead of me. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: dragonwire

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Was never able to use them. They came broken. One of the weld joints that holds the leather top down was broken. As for the other side...the sound was pretty good. Sent it back regardless.
customer_reviews.author: LHerrera

customer_reviews.title: The carrying case and tuning wrench was a nice bonus. I would never recommend these for recording ...
customer_reviews.text: I bough these as a toy for my daughter and she loves them. The carrying case and tuning wrench was a nice bonus. I would never recommend these for recording or live performance because the sound quality is just not good but for just playing around and being less money than some plastic cheap bongos, I'd recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set of bongos, very sturdy and a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of bongos, very sturdy and a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Cheap Construction
customer_reviews.text: This product is very poorly crafted. With anything, especially instruments, you get what you pay for, and we returned this item. The head was crooked, the frame loose, and the skin was not taut. For $99 I got a set of professional grade bongos and you can tell the difference. If you're going to spend this much, go the extra mile and get something that will last longerband play better throughout it's life.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking set. Definitely for amateurs but a lot of fun to play around with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these
customer_reviews.text: Her school did a song where she played hand drums. I wanted to encourage her as she enjoyed it quite a bit. She has played these and brought them in to be included in other shows for the school. Additionally she has now moved onto other drum sets. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Martin

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: One drum was damaged, the other didn't have great sound. I returned.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.

customer_reviews.title: Bongos came broken.. one side was ripped and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bongos came broken..one side was ripped and the wooden bongos were loose...they must have thrown this box and stepped on it
customer_reviews.author: KATIE FRANCIS

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok.
customer_reviews.text: I think it was used. It looks kind of dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Jessalynn

customer_reviews.title: Not great, not bad
customer_reviews.text: The quality on these is fantastic. The sound... Not so much. Sound best if you use a stick instead of your hands, which sucks, because that's why you buy bongos.
customer_reviews.author: nBrix

customer_reviews.title: For beginners only.
customer_reviews.text: No frills very basic. Quality built very solid. Not very loud but they aren’t very large.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for anybody
customer_reviews.text: Is worth the money they're nice bongos the sound quality is really good and my hubby is super happy with his father day gift thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Professional grade!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality drum and the red color on it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: J Notlimah

customer_reviews.title: why not
customer_reviews.text: i dont know what i am doing just yet but good learning instrument and having fun
customer_reviews.author: J-chexs

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months with minor use.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome drums. I got them for my 1 yr old who has a blast on them. We rarely even take them out of the case, but when I did, the metal brace fell off and is now broken :( aside from the poor quality on this one, I really liked them.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A litter smaller than expected but my daughter will like them.
customer_reviews.author: Chasadee Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Very poor construction
customer_reviews.text: Bottom ring misshaped and tension rings break off as soon as you try to tune it. also bad threads on tuning lugs. Waste of money. Spend $30 dollars more and buy an LP.
customer_reviews.author: Millard Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Construction is very good. They are easy to tune with the little tools that came with them and I was able to drill into the wooden connector so I could put them on a stand. The sound is very good and I am using them in a jazz group.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W

customer_reviews.title: This is cheap but, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy but, kind of expected that for the price. Had to reinforce the heads with tape underneath. One of the clamps broke off too.
customer_reviews.author: Jumpin' Flash Jack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have a nice sound (don't forget to tighten the heads).
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and product quality not as expected..
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to try it. Ended up playing with it only 2 -3 times. Sound doesn't even come close to that of the high-end ones. Quality is what you get for the low price. Tuning key also did not come with the product as it supposed to as detailed in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Kups

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: 13year old son asked for a bongo drum. Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Potts

customer_reviews.title: It broke while Tunning and sounded terrible before. Paid $100 bucks for an LP and ...
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars because they let me return at no cost! This is a toy! It broke while Tunning and sounded terrible before. Paid $100 bucks for an LP and life is soooo much better
customer_reviews.author: Laura DeBruler

customer_reviews.title: MONEY WELL SPENT
customer_reviews.text: THESE BEAUTIFULLY AND WELL MADE BONGOS SOUND GREAT AND COME WITH A STURDY BAG. I AM EXTREMELY PLEASED WITH THIS PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl R Harding

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my garage band and it works and sound good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Gorospe

customer_reviews.title: Great pic
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas Gift and the recipient loves these bongos
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Colon

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product! The only issue I had was a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product! The only issue I had was a little chip in it! But this didn't effect the product!
customer_reviews.author: susan robertson

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the pros
customer_reviews.text: Two year old nephew LOVES drums. This is a perfect small size with carry case.
customer_reviews.author: Becoming....

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough.
customer_reviews.text: I had a terrible time with this set of bongoes. I only used them twice and the heads were totally destroyed after I untuned them. Also, the lugs are not enough hard to keep them tuned. I had to return them and ordered LP Matador.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter bongos...go on YouTube, if, like me, you need a tutorial..
customer_reviews.author: Robert shulin

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I didn’t open them until just recently & noticed there’s a crack down the side of one of them... I’m assuming it’s too late to exchange. But other than that, they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Hallas

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: One half turn to tighten and the metal snapped and leg was dunzo. Garbage
customer_reviews.author: BISON RIDER

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken with3 other removed shipping labels taken off Meaning it got returned several times Missing pieces
customer_reviews.author: Cw

customer_reviews.title: Don't try and tune these bongos up to concert pitch...?
customer_reviews.text: Good sound for the money. I tried to tune them up to pitch and one of the welded rim hoops suddenly "popped" loose on the smaller of the two drums. It seems to be holding though and the sound is sweet enough to keep me from returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Muzitronixman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my dad and he loved it!!!! Good quality and nice sound
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A. Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good tone, and price. nice bag also received quickly and when expected would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kahgeo

customer_reviews.title: came broken
customer_reviews.text: clearly the drum had been used, but was supposed to be new. the drum pads are filthy and one has a tear completely across
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: The price is reasonable, but later on I'd like to get better ones.
customer_reviews.text: I like the bongos, first time buyer. Quite sure the more expensive ones will have a better sound. But I like it overall
customer_reviews.author: Michele Hauter

customer_reviews.title: The drums are nice, but the case’s zipper broke after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: I like the drums, but the zipper of the case broke after only using a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kooyumjian

customer_reviews.title: ... Christmas gift for my daughter—she's had a lot of fun with this
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter—she's had a lot of fun with this!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Costello

customer_reviews.title: Still factory warranty on this ?
customer_reviews.text: Sound good but ,the metal hold the pad broke off ,already,is there a kit I can order to fix this bongo ?
customer_reviews.author: jonathan maniaul

customer_reviews.title: Broke on Day One
customer_reviews.text: I tried to adjust sound quality, but it broke on day one.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Allen

customer_reviews.title: WYSIWG
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is impressive for the size. The wood block connecting the drums is poorly secured to the side of the drums. The bag is a thin, cheap material. Pay a few more dollars for something with better ratings.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was what I wanted and that is all that counts.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer of things!

customer_reviews.title: Great bag.
customer_reviews.text: It was missing a bolt cover for the bottom. A little uncomfortable. Great bag tho. Just wished it would have pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna j.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were what we wanted and my daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It came broken and the top was paper
customer_reviews.text: Everything was broken, this instrument had no respect put into the making. The top was made of actual paper. It was a shame to musical instruments.
customer_reviews.author: Michael III

customer_reviews.title: It looks really good when it arrives
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying this very much. It looks really good when it arrives. The case is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: cd

customer_reviews.title: Dirty Drums wasn't  new
customer_reviews.text: Drum wasnt brand new it looked like it was used n returned . It was a gift now I cant give it as a gift because they was dirty

customer_reviews.title: they look more like a toy than a set of real
customer_reviews.text: They were loose and uneven, they look more like a toy than a set of real bongos

customer_reviews.title: She loved it. Ringo Starr on the making

customer_reviews.title: Good To go thanks amazon it came on time
customer_reviews.text: It works good I made it sound how I want Thanks it was also on time 🎊🎉

product_meta.title: RockJam 7" and 8" Bongo Drum Set with Padded Bag and Tuning Key, Natural
product_meta.description: Color:NaturalThe Rock Jam traditional wooden bongo drums are a fantastic choice for students and beginners looking for a high quality product at an affordable price. Students in their hundreds take bongo's to university and this great pair by RockJam provide great tone and superb construction. Crafted from beautiful cuts of wood and fitted with 7" and 8" cow skin heads, these great bongos also come complete with a tuning key and robust black bag with carry strap - Perfect for slinging over the shoulder when on the move. Players young and old who are after an affordable set of Bongo Drums within a realistic budget should look no further than the RockJam 100300 Bongo's.
feature_bullets: Includes Padded Carry Case and Tuning Key
Note: The skins have to be gradually tightened evenly rather than one side at a time. This can stress both the frame and the skin
